text_block_list.text:
It was the end of a long day of work. I sat down to rest… and 
remembered my encounter with Manhattan Cafe…
choice_data_list: Maybe I should go and see her again…

text_block_list.text:
I wasn't sure if she'd even be there or not, but the thought 
lingered. I decided to go out to the track. But…
(click, clack…)

…the door. It wouldn't open. The handle turned just 
fine, but when I pushed, it didn't budge.
choice_data_list: (Is someone pushing on it from outside…?)

text_block_list.text:
Surely not. I pulled back, and flung all my weight at the door… 
It opened.
And of course, there was nobody to be seen.

'Door must be warped,' I said to myself. After all, 
what else could it have been? I put it from my mind, 
and set out for the training course.

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text: Haa, haa… hah―

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text:
All these years… I've been chasing you… ever since I was a child… 
Why… why can I never get any closer…?

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text: How… do you find such speed in the corners…

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text: How do you run like that, flowing like water…

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text:
You really are special… 
But… one day… I will catch you…

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text:
Yes… let's run… 
Again…… and again… and again…

With long, languid strides, she almost seemed to 
melt into the night air, before finding an effortless 
surge of speed in the final straight.

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text: ―hnng…!

From a mere shadow on the edge of perception, she made her 
presence suddenly and terrifyingly real with a final explosion of 
power. For a moment, I thought I was seeing things…

So…? What do we think of that? 
A fascinating specimen, I'm sure you'll agree.

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text:
Good reactions! Any change in your body temperature, do you 
think? I'd love to see your ECG but… maybe another time…

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text:
You must be a new trainer, I presume? Out here looking for 
promising young talent? Either that, or…

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text:
A suspicious, unauthorized person, furtively watching 
Uma Musume in the dead of night?! This won't do at 
all, I should call security post-haste!
choice_data_list: I'm a trainer! I'm a trainer!!

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text:
Is that so? That's a relief. 
And? I take it that one over there has caught your eye?
choice_data_list: No, well, sort of. She's… interesting…

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text:
Hmm… is that so? Or are you mistaking for "interest" 
the ambiguous physiological response of your 
body to other, stranger phenomena…

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text:
Whatever you decide to call it, if you are "interested" then you 
should probably introduce yourself sooner rather than later. 
Time, after all, is a finite resource.

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text:
Anyway, intrigued as I am to see her reaction, 
I must excuse myself. My research awaits.

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text: Ah. But let me leave you with one piece of advice.

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text:
Be bold. 
She is surprisingly susceptible to… pressure.
…What was that about…?

"Stranger phenomena"… has she felt it too? Does 
the unexplained follow Manhattan Cafe around…?

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text: Fu― Haa…

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text:
…? 
Good evening.

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text:
Yes… 
The darkness… helps me to see…

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text: Can I… help you…?
choice_data_list: I was just wondering who you were talking to before…

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text: She is…

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text: …a friend.

I looked around, and saw no one. What did 
she mean? I looked back at her, puzzled…

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text:
You…… cannot see her…… No matter how hard you look ……you do not 
have eyes to see. Neither you… nor anyone else…

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text:
So please…… Do not concern yourself. There 
is no reason to …concern yourself.

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text:
No one knows she is there. No one but me. 
Because… she is far, far away 
… on the other side…
choice_data_list: Okay, so… she's a friend that only you can see?
Okay, so… she's a friend that only you can see?

text_block_list.text:
I took her at her word… but what could that 
even mean? A friend that only she can see?
Surely she didn't mean some kind of… ghost…?

A… voice? No, not a voice… not even a word. A… feeling? Like a 
ball of raw emotion, resonating in my head…

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text: Are you… afraid…?

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text:
Nothing… 
Never mind…

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text: I should go.
Manhattan Cafe bowed curtly, and left.

The strange things that had been happening to me… were they all 
related to Manhattan Cafe's mysterious "friend"?

There was so much I didn't understand… but one thing 
was clear. She could run like no one else…
